process.title: Vine Case Study: Simone Shepherd
process.subtitle: The real cause of the Jay-Z – Solange elevator fight
process.copy: Simone remains one of the biggest stars on Vine, and it’s no wonder why. From her uncanny Beyonce impressions to original quips, she impresses talent and touch into each six-second clip. We wondered what would happen if the camera was on her even longer, so we started out with a series of Vines and expanded from there. When our initial collaborations verified her off-the-charts audience engagement, we decided to feature her on our Tawk show – and eventually developed a series with her center-stage.

process.title: Vine Case Study: Gabbie Hanna
process.subtitle: We all have that one friend...
process.copy: When we spotted Gabbie, we couldn’t help but fall in love with her refreshing, authentic sense of humor. We knew we wanted to collaborate with her, so we started out small: with a low-cost beta-test on Vine to refine a strategy before expanding to bigger series like ANXT on YouTube and videos on other platforms. Since then, she’s been featured in Vanity Fair, Business Insider, and starred in an original series on Verizon’s Go90 app.

process.title: Snapchat Case Study: Snap Romance
process.subtitle: A semi-scripted modern take on the rom-com
process.copy: As a way to engage the connected generation where they live, we developed Snap Romance on Snapchat: a semi-scripted modern take on the rom-com that tests the flexibility of Snapchat as a storytelling medium using a “back and forth” mechanism between two main protagonists—a highly innovative use of the platform.
